spell.name: Primal Connection
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to better interact with animals. When you Cast the Spell, you can Recall Knowledge (Nature) or Command an Animal. You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill used for the roll. This bonus remains as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Primal Connection

spell.name: Lesser Handler

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Handler, you choose to replicate  Friendfetch, Pet Cache, Animal Messenger, or Speak with Animals. Lesser Handler gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Handler.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

dragonmark.greater: You may cast Lesser Handler up to two times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.grand: You may cast Lesser Handler up to three times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Lesser Handler any number of times per daily preparation.

dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Greater Handler up to three times per daily preparation.

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. Grand Handler gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Grand Handler.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Grand Handler up to two times per daily preparation.

spell.name: Siberys Handler

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Siberys Handler, you choose to replicate Power Word Stun (but you can only target creatures with the animal or beast trait), Nature's Enmity, or any spell listed in the Lesser, Greater or Grand Handler spells. Siberys Handler gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Siberys Handler.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.
